description.value: At 9th level, you can turn gaseous (as the spell @Compendium[pf1.spells.mqdoexj35atgqafn]{Gaseous Form}) for a number of rounds per day equal to your sorcerer level. These rounds need not be consecutive. At 11th level and every two levels thereafter, your speed while gaseous increases by +10 feet, to a maximum speed of 60 feet at 19th level.
